import React, {useContext} from 'react' import CartContext from './CartContext' const CartItem = ({id, name, image, price, amount}) => { // const { id, name, image, price, amount} = item const {eliminateFromCart}= useContext(CartContext) return (
{name}
{/* */}

{amount}

{/* */}
Total $ {price * amount}
) } export default CartItem
